VI.i.1.B.3.g
.
Soliciting Claims in a RADL-Generated Decision Notice
Follow the instructions in the
VBMS Awards User Guide
to solicit a claim in a RADL-generated decision notice.
Reference
:  For more information about soliciting claims for chronic, unclaimed disabilities, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 2.G.2
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Decision Notices
citation: Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
